pages.text: There are several commands that are useful for getting around Westeros

pages.title: Warping
pages.text: $(li)$(l)/warp <location>$()$(br)The warp command lets you travel to any location in Westeros with ease.  For example, $(c:/warp winterfell)/warp winterfell$(/c) takes you to the castle. $(li)$(l)/listwarps$()$(br) This command lists all the warps we have, across every world
